text:
e="preserve">Maurice Houdayer (18 July 1931 – 1 October 2020) was a French rower. He competed at the 1956 European Rowing Championships in Bled, Yugoslavia, with the men's eight where they won the silver medal.
He was part of the 1956 Summer Olympics in Melbourne with the men's eight, finishing in eighth place.
Houdayer died on 1 October 2020 at the age of 89.
